titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon a late nameless and scurrilous libel, entituled, A bank-dialogue between Dr. H.C. and a country-gentleman. In a letter to a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Hugh, fl. 1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hugh Chamberlen by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
